After Shisui manifests his Susanoo's upper-body, it opens its ribcage to expose its chest before launching a barrage of large, green-coloured chakra needles at an incredible speed. 

==Trivia==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', Shisui is able to use this technique manifested with [[Susanoo|Complete Body — Susanoo]] as well; using its giant drill as a conduit to fire off the needles.
